description: John Magnum has plans later tonight with his girlfriend. Some dinner, maybe a movie, then back to the crib for some action. Zack Blake has got nothing going on tonight, so when the two roommates run into each other in the bathroom, they seem to be on opposite courses. Well John finds out that the thing about the best laid plans is that often it is better to scrap your plans and just get laid. Enjoy!
title: THE BEST LAID PLANS
